library(tidyverse)

df <- read_csv('stepsmood.csv')

ggplot(df, aes(x = steps, y = mood)) +
    geom_point(color = "blue", size = 2) +
    labs(title = "                                 Scatterplot of Steps vs. Mood Scale", x = "Steps", y = "Mood Scale")
    
    
correlation <- cor(df$steps, d$mood)
correlation

mysum <- df %>%
  group_by(mood) %>%
  summarise(count = n(),
            means = mean(steps),
            sds =sd(steps)) %>%
          mutate(ses =sds/sqrt(count)) %>%
          mutate(cis = 1.96*ses)
          
show(mysum)

t.test(df$steps, df$mood, paired = TRUE)
